episodes.summary: What would it feel like to land a deal nearing a billion dollars? Today’s guest, Alan Guinn, is here to share! Alan joins us to detail his long and storied career in real estate investing projects, and how he has successfully expanded his portfolio throughout the years. Alan is the managing director and CEO of Guinn Consultancy Group, and his portfolio is expanding to include a massive international project nearing the billion-dollar mark! On this episode of Investing in Real Estate, Alan is sharing what it takes to be a successful investor, how to let go of the fear of failure, and he also sheds light on the future of the market!

episodes.title: EP043: Should I Pay Off Debt or Invest in Real Estate?
episodes.author: Clayton Morris
episodes.summary: Should you pay off debt before you begin investing in real estate? Is being debt-free a requirement for investing? On today’s show, Natali and I are answering these questions, and sharing how you can make the right decision for your particular situation. This topic is one of our most frequently asked questions, and we’re excited to address the topic. Many people understand the value of real estate investing, but are concerned about approaching investing when weighed down by debt. Listen in to this episode of Investing in Real Estate to hear how to address your debt, assess your expenses, and how to be creative in real estate investing!

episodes.seriesTitle: Investing in Real Estate with Clayton Morris | Buy and Hold Investing | Turnkey Real Estate| Passive Income
episodes.title: EP042: The Best Way to Buy Rental Properties with No Money
episodes.author: Clayton Morris
episodes.summary: Have you ever wanted to purchase buy and hold properties, but felt confined by the structure of traditional mortgages? Maybe you have little to no money for a down payment, or your credit score is holding you back from qualifying for a bank loan. Luckily, there is another way! Seller financing is a unique, creative, and incredibly viable means of purchasing rental real estate. On today’s show, I’m sharing my experience with seller-financed properties, and explaining how structuring a seller-financed deal can be mutually beneficial. I’ll also talk about the major benefits of seller financing, what to be wary of, and give specific examples of how seller financing can work for you. To hear more about seller financing, don’t miss this episode of Investing in Real Estate!

episodes.author: Clayton Morris
episodes.summary: Real estate investing is one of the safest ways to earn passive income, as long as certain safeguards are put in place. If you’ve ever wondered how to insure you’re your real estate investing business is sustainable, you won’t want to miss this episode! Today’s expert guest, Joe McCall, is here to share the mistakes he made in his buy and hold investing business. Joe McCall is a real estate investor, podcast host, and author. Although he is successful today, Joe lost everything during the 2008 housing crisis. On this episode of Investing in Real Estate, Joe is elaborating on what he learned from the experience, and how he’s rebuilding his business today. We also talk about building a business around the lifestyle you want to live, planning for retirement, and making a passive income while you travel.

We’ll discuss our different banking accounts, how we apply the quarterly bonus, and how the system works for real estate investing specifically. If you’ve ever wondered how Profit First actually works in practice, you won’t want to miss this episode of Investing in Real Estate!

Tom Wheelwright is a tax genius who authored the book, Tax-Free wealth. He is the founder and CEO of ProVision, as well as the personal tax advisor of “Rich Dad,” Robert Kiyosaki. Today on Investing in Real Estate, Tom is covering everything you need to know about real estate investing taxes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Investing in Real Estate with Clayton Morris | Buy and Hold Investing | Turnkey Real Estate| Passive Income
episodes.title: EP021: The One Thing Holding You Back
episodes.author: Clayton Morris
episodes.summary: What is your biggest obstacle when it comes to investing in real estate? Are you concerned about money? Are you worried about your debt, or your credit score? I talk to so many people that feel the same way. The truth is, this is a huge misconception. You are not your credit score. The problem runs deeper than that. Many of us are ingrained with the idea that we are unworthy of money, and unable to achieve true success. This isn't true! Money isn't holding you back, it's your fear of money. The reason I know this is because I too have been trapped in this mode of thinking. On this episode of Investing in Real Estate, I’m sharing my own personal experience with overcoming my financial fears and anxieties, and specific tools and methods you can use to change the way you think about money.

On episode 20 of Investing in Real Estate, Sylvia is sharing how she purchased her first property, her strategy going forward, and more about her experience getting started in buy and hold real estate.

episodes.summary:
Looking to achieve financial freedom? Looking to create true legacy wealth for your family? The kind of wealth that you hand down to the next generation? 

I've found that the only true way is to create passive income through real estate investing. And the only way to start on this journey is to understand your Freedom Number. 

In today's episode I'm going to walk you through the exact formula I used to change my life. Don't worry the download for today's episode is available on our website at www.morrisinvest.com/podcast in the show notes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Investing in Real Estate with Clayton Morris | Buy and Hold Investing | Turnkey Real Estate| Passive Income
episodes.title: EP002: Why a Florida investor buys rentals in the midwest
episodes.author: Clayton Morris
episodes.summary: In the last few years Tom Krol went from buying rental properties in his own Florida backyard to buying rental properties in the Midwest. Tom is a seasoned wholesale investor so we wanted to know why he stopped acquiring properties that he had to manage himself. In today's episode you'll learn from Tom's biggest mistake when he started buying properties.

episodes.seriesTitle: Investing in Real Estate with Clayton Morris | Buy and Hold Investing | Turnkey Real Estate| Passive Income
episodes.title: EP001: The Future of Real Estate Investing
episodes.author: Clayton Morris
episodes.summary:
Congratulations! You're taking the first steps towards building legacy wealth for you and your family. In my opinion real estate is the smartest, safest, and fast way to increase your net worth. Can you think of another way to increase net worth while also creating passive income? I can't.

But I can hear you saying "Hold your horses! Didn't we just go through a big housing collapse?" You're right! We did about 8 years ago. A lot has changed since then. That's why today's episode is entirely devoted  to looking at the future of real estate investing from 2017 and beyond. 

In today's episode we're talking about the biggest reasons to LOVE real estate investing in 2016 and beyond.
